metadata.title: CVE-2019-19553 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.0.0 to 3.0.6 and 2.6.0 to 2.6.12, the CMS dissector could crash. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/asn1/cms/packet-cms-template.c by ensuring that an object identifier is set to NULL after a ContentInfo dissection.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.7-1').
